评论概述: Very disappointed in the fabric & shrinkage; different from 1 year ago
评论详情: I bought the blue and green version of this shirt on April 5, 2023, from the same seller (Lunoakvo). I have loved it for a year — like, SUPER loved it. I love the oversized Harajuku style shown in the seller's photos.  So, I finally decided to get the black and gray version in the same size on May 18, 2024. When I first opened the packaged, I started to worry because the fabric didn't seem as good as the blue and green version. It wasn't as soft. However, I double-checked that I'd purchased the two shirts from the same seller, and once confirming that, figured that the fabric must improve with washing so that it achieves the same softness as the blue and green version. It has not. In fact, it's gotten worse.  Not only is the fabric for the black and gray shirt still scratchier and stiffer, but it has also shrunk from washing (in cold water on a delicates cycle) and drying (on low heat), even though I have followed the same care routine that I do for the blue and green version. As you can see from my photo, the sleeves and torso are much shorter. Even the width of the shirt seems slightly narrower. I will never wear this shirt because it's pretty much a standard long-sleeve t-shirt at this point, and I have others that are much softer.

评论概述: It's a staple for my closet
评论详情: I like how comfy it is, but the bottom of the shirt tends to rise a bit much if you lift your arms up to much. But other than that, generally something I was looking for.

评论概述: Love the look hate the feel!

The shoulders felt very stiff and broad, the sleeves were too thick but everything else was fitting okay? Very disappointed because I was in love with the design and have been looking forever to get a shirt in dark grey and black horizontal stripes.  I recommend those who want to cross dress to be cautious when picking out clothes to wear cause not all will fit the same. This feels more like a mens shirt.

评论概述: Size up if you want it to be baggy

Honestly there's nothing about the shirt that's particularly"oversized" except for the sleeves which are a bit wider than the average women's long sleeve shirt. I like dark grey and black color combos and it's hard to find clothing pieces and accessories that include both so I'm happy I found this shirt.

评论概述: Great, but was expecting it to be a bit baggier
评论详情: I had ordered a size smaller than what I usually wear because of all the reviews claiming that it runs large, but when I saw it I realized that it's not actually the case. A large fits just like a typical men's size L shirt.  If you're like me and prefer to wear your clothes large-fitting and loose, take my advice and don't be afraid to go up a size or two! I mean no offense, of course, but I think it needs to be taken into account that most of these reviews are from women who are so accustomed to wearing skin-tight clothing that they think any shirt that doesn't look painted on is "too big".  Overall, it's lovely and just my style and I'm very happy with it.
Good quality, true to size. Would recommend
